contracts.title: PR Merge Status Monitoring & Tracker Updates
contracts.description: Monitor 7 open PRs for merge status changes. Update PHASE1_EXECUTION_TRACKING.md and MASTER_CONSOLIDATION_TRACKER.md immediately when PRs merge. Maintain SSOT accuracy throughout PR merge phase.

contracts.title: Status Delta Broadcasting
contracts.description: Broadcast status deltas to Captain + Agent-1 when PR merges occur. Ensure real-time coordination updates maintain GAS pipeline alignment. Document all status changes in coordination messages.

contracts.title: Skipped Repos Rationale Documentation
contracts.description: Document and validate rationale for 4 skipped repos (repos don't exist). Ensure rationale is captured in trackers and broadcasts when referenced. Support Phase 2 planning with complete skip rationale.

contracts.title: Tracker Validation Automation Tool
contracts.description: Create automated tracker validation tool to prevent status drift. Tool should verify SSOT consistency across PHASE1_EXECUTION_TRACKING.md and MASTER_CONSOLIDATION_TRACKER.md. V2 compliant (<400 lines), add to toolbelt.

contracts.title: Phase 2 (Goldmine) Planning Support
contracts.description: Support Captain with Phase 2 (Goldmine) planning after PR merges complete. Coordinate with Agent-1 on execution readiness. Update trackers with Phase 2 plan once established.

notes: Primary focus: PR merge monitoring and status delta broadcasting. Tracker validation tool will prevent future status drift. Phase 2 planning support ready after PR merges complete.
